modular package¶

Submodules¶

modular.modular module¶

modular.modular.findContainedWords(word: str, wordCollections: Dict[int, List[str]]) → Tuple[str, str, str][source]¶

finds all words wordCollections that can be combined to make word

an array of tuples with the structure (word, firstHalf, secondHalf)

modular.modular.getCompletingWords(bigWord: str, smallWord: str, wordCollections: Dict[int, List[str]])[source]¶

if another word is in the collection that can append to smallWord to make bigWord it will return

modular.modular.getStartingWords(bigWord: str, wordCollections: Dict[int, List[str]])[source]¶

Parses the wordcollections for smaller words that are the start of the bigWord

modular.modular.initializeMissingKeys(dictionary: Dict[int, List[str]]) → None[source]¶

if the dictionary has keys 1, 3, 5 it will fill in the missing values of 0, 2, 4.

Reads the file and returns an array of each row

modular.modular.sortItemsByLength(collection: Dict[int, List[str]]) → Dict[int, List[str]][source]¶

places items in an array in a dictionary where the key is the items length

modular.modular.validateTargetWordSize(size: int, collections: Dict[int, List[str]])[source]¶

checks that the size of word targeted is in the collections keys

modular.modular.wordSizesSmallerThan(word: range)[source]¶

returns a range starting at 0 and going up to one less than the length of the word
